title: genomic-medicine-sweden/skierfe pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

file.errorMessage: FastQ or BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz', '.fastq.gz' or '.bam'

family_id.errorMessage: Family ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces. If no family ID is available, use the same ID as the sample.

paternal_id.errorMessage: Paternal ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces. If no paternal ID is available, use any ID not in sample column.

maternal_id.errorMessage: Maternal ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces. If no maternal ID is available, use any ID not in sample column.

sex.errorMessage: Sex must be provided as 1 (male) or 2 (female)

phenotype.errorMessage: Phenoype must be provided as 1 (unaffected) or 2 (affected)
